results.description: The opening round of 2020 Super League fixtures includes a repeat of the 2019 Grand Final between St Helens and Salford.
results.shortTitle: Saints start 2020 season against Salford
results.title: Super League 2020 fixtures: St Helens start v Salford, Toronto open v Castleford

thumbnail.altText: St Helens lift the Super League Grand Final trophy

results.description: Super League Grand Finalists St Helens and Salford will meet again when Magic Weekend returns to Newcastle in May 2020.
results.shortTitle: Grand Final repeat on Magic Weekend
results.title: Magic Weekend: St Helens and Salford to meet in Grand Final repeat

results.description: Castleford sign half-back Danny Richardson from Super League champions St Helens for an undisclosed fee.
results.shortTitle: Castleford sign St Helens' Richardson
results.title: Danny Richardson: Castleford Tigers sign St Helens half-back to replace Luke Gale

results.description: Jordan Rankin is to remain at Castleford in 2020 and Joe Wardle at Huddersfield after the Super League clubs renew their swap deals.
results.shortTitle: Rankin and Wardle swap again for 2020
results.title: Jordan Rankin & Joe Wardle: Castleford and Huddersfield swap deal renewed for 2020

results.description: England half-back Luke Gale says his late mother would be proud of him joining Leeds Rhinos after years driving him there when he was an academy player.
results.shortTitle: 'Mum would be proud of Leeds move' - Gale
results.title: Luke Gale: 'Mum would be proud of Leeds Rhinos move'

results.description: England half-back Luke Gale joins Leeds Rhinos from Castleford Tigers on a three-year deal for an undisclosed fee.
results.shortTitle: Leeds Rhinos sign England half-back Gale
results.title: Luke Gale: Leeds Rhinos sign Castleford Tigers & England half-back

thumbnail.altText: Luke Gale in action for Castleford

results.description: Five clubs will be involved in Super League's new play-off system and hope to reach the Grand Final on 12 October.
results.shortTitle: How do the Super League play-offs work?
results.title: Super League: How do the play-offs work?

thumbnail.altText: Wigan Warriors win the 2018 Grand Final

results.description: Salford are within one win of Super League's Grand Final after beating Castleford in their play-off eliminator.
results.shortTitle: Salford beat Tigers to reach semi-final
results.title: Super League: Salford Red Devils 22-0 Castleford Tigers

thumbnail.altText: Salford Red Devils celebrate a try

results.description: Salford beat Castleford 22-0 to secure a Super League play-off semi-final place - relive the action as it happened.
results.shortTitle: How Salford secured a Super League semi-final spot
results.title: Super League play-offs: Salford Red Devils 22-0 Castleford Tigers as it happened

results.description: Castleford end Warrington's season with a hard-fought elimination final victory against the Challenge Cup holders.
results.shortTitle: Tigers beat Wolves in elimination final
results.title: Super League elimination final: Castleford hang on for 14-12 win over Warrington

results.description: Warrington's Blake Austin is among five nominees named for the 2019 Steve Prescott Man of Steel award.
results.shortTitle: Five nominated for Man of Steel award
results.title: Steve Prescott Man of Steel: Austin, Coote, Hastings, Watts and Williams nominated

results.description: Relive Castleford Tigers' Super League elimination final win against Warrington Wolves.
results.shortTitle: Relive Castleford's elimination final win against Warrington
results.title: Super League elimination final: Relive Castleford's win against Warrington out

thumbnail.altText: Ben Westwood of Warrington Wolves clashes with Adam Milner of Castleford Tigers

results.description: Castleford's Jesse Sene-Lefao and Warrington's Matty Smith are likely to miss the first round of the Super League play-offs through suspension.
results.shortTitle: Sene-Lefao & Smith face play-off bans
results.title: Super League play-offs: Castleford's Jesse Sene-Lefao & Warrington's Matty Smith face bans

results.description: Five players from League Leaders' Shield winners St Helens are named in Super League's Dream Team for the 2019 season.
results.shortTitle: Saints quintet in Super League Dream Team
results.title: Super League Dream Team: St Helens quintet included in 2019 line-up

results.description: Wigan Warriors win for the 12th time in 13 games to finish second in Super League and leave Castleford sweating on a top five finish.
results.shortTitle: Wigan beat Castleford to secure second
results.title: Super League: Wigan win 26-8 to secure second - but top five place under threat for Tigers

thumbnail.altText: George Williams scored the first of Wigan's four tries

results.description: Wigan Warriors host Castleford Tigers in the Super League - listen to BBC local radio commentary.
results.shortTitle: Listen: Wigan Warriors v Castleford Tigers
results.title: Listen to Wigan Warriors v Castleford Tigers live commentary

results.description: St Helens's Matty Lees, whose season was ended because of a perforated bowel, is among five shortlisted for the Super League Young Player of the Year award.
results.shortTitle: Five shortlisted for Young player award
results.title: Super League: Injured Matty Lees among five shortlisted for Young Player of the Year

thumbnail.altText: Matty Lees in action for St Helens

results.description: Castleford Tigers keep their hopes of reaching the Super League play-offs alive by beating Hull FC 44-12 to move up to fifth.
results.shortTitle: Tigers dominate Hull to go fifth
results.title: Super League: Castleford Tigers beat Hull FC 44-12 to go fifth in table

thumbnail.altText: Jake Trueman in action for Castleford Tigers

results.description: Castleford Tigers host Hull FC in the Super League - listen to BBC radio commentary.

results.title: Listen to Castleford Tigers v Hull FC commentary

results.description: Ireland's Joe Philbin, Scotland's Lachlan Coote and Wales' Morgan Knowles join Great Britain's elite performance squad.
